ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the reason that the
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the reason that the procedure was not performed?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate why the procedure was not performed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUPPPR.QVAL
ReferenceDocuments.description: This information could be submitted in a SUPPPR dataset as the value of SUPPPR.QVAL where SUPPPR.QNAM = "PRREASOC" and SUPPPR.QLABEL ="Reason for Occur Value". Refer to the current SDTM and SDTMIG for instructions on placement of non-standard variables in SDTM domains.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The reason the scheduled procedure was not performed may be chosen from a sponsor-defined codelist (e.g., SUBJECT REFUSED, etc.) or entered as free text. When --REASOC is used, --OCCUR must also be populated in the SDTM dataset with a value of "N".

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-10 ak Released per governance approval. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.27.18
